titleStmt.title: A dyurnall: for deuoute soules to ordre them selfe therafter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted by me Robert wyer, dwellynge at the sygne of saynt Iohan Euangelyst, in saynt Martyns parysshe, in the bysshop of Norwytche rentes besyde charynge Crosse,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC.
Title page verso has 52x42 mm woodcut crucifixion (Hodnett 2498).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sygne of saynt Iohan Euangelyst, in saynt Martyns parysshe, in the bysshop of Norwytche rentes besyde charynge Crosse
